wikitext.*:
<includeonly>{| class="" style=" background:{{{bg-color|#c9f6e1}}};" width="{{{width|70%}}}" 
{{#forargs: Name
  | key
  | val
  |<nowiki/>
  {{#if:{{{custom{{#var:key|}}|}}}
    |{{Main Characters Infolist/brick2
      |Name= {{#var:val|}}
      |image= {{{image{{#var:key|}}|}}}
      |image info = {{{image info{{#var:key|}}| }}}
      |info = {{{info{{#var:key|}}|  }}}
      |CV = {{{CV{{#var:key|}}| 未知 }}}
      |th-color= {{{th-color|#13ec93}}}
      |td-color= {{{td-color|#f3f3f3}}}
      |cv-color= {{{cv-color|#f3f3f3}}}
    }}
    |{{Main Characters Infolist/brick
      |Name= {{#var:val|}}
      |image= {{{image{{#var:key|}}|}}}
      |image info = {{{image info{{#var:key|}}| }}}
      |info = {{{info{{#var:key|}}|  }}}
      |CV = {{{CV{{#var:key|}}| 未知 }}}
      |th-color= {{{th-color|#13ec93}}}
      |td-color= {{{td-color|#f3f3f3}}}
      |cv-color= {{{cv-color|#f3f3f3}}}
    }}
  }}
}}
|}</includeonly><noinclude>{{Documentation}}[[分类:信息模板]]</noinclude>
